ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-18 17:52:33. [Issue ID 225128]
ComicInfo.Title: HC
ComicInfo.Summary: Some of the comic book industries best and brightest use their talents to welcome the next generation of comic book readers with the kid-friendly anthology, FRACTURED FABLES! Features all-new, humorous takes on our most beloved fairy tales with stories by award-winning creators like JILL THOMPSON, BRYAN TALBOT, PETER DAVID, BEN TEMPLESMITH, TERRY MOORE, SCOTT MORSE, DOUG TENNAPEL, TED McKEEVER, BILL MORRISON, LARRY MARDER, JIM VALENTINO, PHIL HESTER, SHANNON WHEELER and many more!
ComicInfo.Characters: Little Miss Muffet,Rumpelstiltskin,Queen Of Hearts,Cheshire Cat,Santa Claus,Sleeping Beauty,Fairy Godmother,Rapunzel,Pinocchio,Jack The Giant Killer,The Little Mermaid,Blue Fairy,Hansel,The Princess on the Pea,The Little Match Girl,Alice,Big Bad Wolf,Humpty Dumpty,Cinderella,The Frog Prince,Geppetto,Gretel,Red Riding Hood
